item.title: Practical cataloging principles
item.description: I have typed out various specific cataloging procedures, I have pushed for certain cataloging changes, and I have specified requirements of our new cataloging system, but I have never spelled out the overarching principles I base my thoughts on. This post is an attempt to start spelling out some possible overarching principles about cataloging. Perhaps some ideas make little sense outside of my organization due to organizational specifics, but I think at least some of these principles could be of use elsewhere.
